author: elecharny
msg: Implemented a small improvment in the way RDN are used in the getFarthest() method. As the DN parser is not called anymore,
this leads to a great boost of performance (40 000 DN parsing avoided when 10 000 searches requests are done)
Cleaned the code, added some nl.

author: janne
msg: moved Wicket.Drag.fixEvent to Wicket.fixEvent because it doesn't have anything to do with dragging

author: schor
msg: No Jira: fix run of ant docbook by adding inheritAll="false" - the ant docbook run was
inheriting values from the maven surround, making some parts of it not work correctly.
Also, add the <quiet>true</quiet> option to the java doc step to eliminate informational
only messages - allowing the Assemble operation messages to be scannable by a human :-)

author: schor
msg: [UIMA-238] - enable "uptodate" skipping of building docbooks if already up to date.
Dependencies are on source, "olink" updates, and locally defined "styles".
If you change the tooling, run "clean" or delete the target dir to force a rerun.
New extracts will always do a complete rerun (because there is no "target" dir).
